description:
In a last ditch effort to save his friends, Gohan launches an all out assault on Garlic Junior! Meanwhile, deep within the Lookout, Kami and Mr. Popo are under siege by the Former Guardians!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Água Ultra Sagrada Salva o Mundo
Kiitaze Choushinsui!! Sekai ga Akumu kara Sameta
วารีศักดิ์สิทธิ์ใช้ได้ผล โลกรอดพ้นจากหายนะแล้ว
効いたぜ超神水!! 世界が悪夢からさめた
